data.name: Delicious Dungeon
data.detailed_description:
Delicious Dungeon is a combination of action-adventure and simulation game. The player is the owner of a local restaurant in a fantasy world.
But to run the restaurant they have to explore dungeons full of dangers and enemies to get the ingredients needed to cook delicious meals for their guests.

Step into a fantasy world where you own a cosy restaurant in your homestead. Now you have to figure out how to keep the restaurant running! You need ingredients to be able to cook orders every night.
However, to get them you have to go into the beast-filled dungeon and fight for them.


The Dungeon:
Fight various beasts in the area to gather ingredients for cooking. Not only do you loot the slain beasts, but also some plants that grow in the environment!

Kill the boss who is waiting for you in the dungeon. Through him you gain large amounts of ingredients or maybe even something special to cook...?

Too scared of the mean animals? The local adventure guild will gladly take it upon themselves to bring you the ingredients, for a few coins of course.

Your restaurant:
Plan the dishes for the evening in order to use up your supplies as efficient as possible.

Cook the ordered meals for your fellow villagers by mastering mini-games. Don't worry, they like to take their time eating and won't rush you to finish their order quickly.
However, you should still prepare the dishes carefully since some villagers are fussy about their food. They pay more or less depending on how good the food was prepared.

Or maybe you don't feel like cooking at all? Well, in that case, you'd better earn enough with your first sales and hire helpers to do the cooking for you. However, you still have to take care of the menu and the evening opening, it's still your restaurant.

The village:
Take a look around the village and you can improve your cooking utensils at the blacksmith or buy new spices from the botanist.

Talk to the villagers and find out what they think of your restaurant or how much they care about a perfectly prepared meal.

All done for the day? Then hit the sack to save your progress and the adventure can continue!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
